page.title: 12BIOGRAPHY OF BURNTWOOD
page.content: It is a well known fact that the divorce rate in Burntwood is the second highest in the country. In the Lichfield area in 1984 these were the following figures for births, deaths and marriages: BIRTHS - 1,057; DEATHS - 777; MARRIAGES - 969. A DAY IN THE LIFE FOR A:- YOUNG MAN - Life in Chasetown can be boring when he is unemployed because he doesn't have much to do and doesn't have much money to do it with. He will not be using his education a lot in his day. He won't be able to marry easily without a job. MIDDLE AGED MAN - Life in Chastown can often be enjoyable when he has a job. He can get out and have a change of surroundings. Some education is used but not extensively. Children restrict parents finacially and sometimes socially.
